post_content:
1909 T206 Clarke (Holding bat)-crescent crease on right side which is evident in the front scan. The crease is also evident on the back left side. Also, two little white dots between the second and third red lines on the lower arm on the right side. Finally, this card also has corner wear.  Now $110.00.

S/h is $5.00 unless it is to the states of California, Oregon or Washington in which cases the s/h is $5.50. If you are paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
